member.name: T:AkkaDiagram.ActorSystemExtensions
member.summary: Extension Methods to inject the AkkaDiagram logger and set it up with default configurations

member.name: M:AkkaDiagram.ActorSystemExtensions.InjectAkkaDiagrams(Akka.Configuration.Config,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This injects the needed debug-logging configuration and adds the diagram actor Be aware of stuff not working if you change debug and logging in config before you inject AkkaDiagrams!
